(Happy B' Day Alloran! I drink to your health! Now, I've got a great 
idea! For the Autobots and Decepticons, why don't we have a group 
make some sort of ray, and than they blast it to cover the planet. 
When the bots come in contact with it, they wake up. People can take 
control of them. Starting the Great War 4 million years early. Now 
that's great. Now, I have some bad news. Heard from Bob Skir. He says 
he would love to come, but he can't, because he doesn't want us in 
trouble. He looked at nbwrpg.tripod.com, and saw they we were using 
some real Beast Wars names. We're kinda breaking copyright laws by 
doing that. If he comes, he'll atract attention to the site, and than 
we'll be shut down and mainframe would sue either all of us or just 
the council, depending on ow bad the infrigment. He said to keep low 
and be quiet. Either he cares of that was some lame excuse not to 
come and keep us admiring him. I think it's the latter. And JP, if 
there's a problem with this post tell me. By what I read I thought 
Hell Beast was close to the door.)

Starscream

Starscream was walking towars the Maximal, whom his scanners said was 
behind a dune, when Megatron and his cronies arrived. He couldn't be 
out here alone. He would be creamed. At least that Maximal would be 
toasted if Megatron saw him. He ran, rolling and ducking fire, and 
went for the door. When he got there he saw Hell Beast, trying to 
open it. He immediatly put his hand around his neck and a launcher to 
his head.

"You're running with the wrong crowd. Didn't I gvie you a warning 
already?"

Starscream's signal opened the door, and he took Hell Beast in with 
him. It locked behind him. He called to KitKat.

"Honey, look who's come for dinner!"
______________________________________________________________________
Fliq

Between sobs, Fliq answered Ramulus' question.

"He..*sniff* got so angry because they destroyed everything we got on 
the moon that Bronco took over. It caused him to go crazy with his 
launcher, and he shot himself." Fliq broke down again, "I'm the last 
one now. Gekkidama's dead. Brix is dead. I don't know what to do." He 
hugged the body close and kept crying.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois kept crying for Battera, and than something. On the other side 
of the room, a mirror/mirage appeared, and it had Battera being 
abused by....him! She must be having her own dream sequence. He saw 
the battle before him, and it semed that hte past had a slight 
advantage, but not much. But he had to get her out of here. The 
program had been downloaded. It was up to it's strength now. Battera 
needed to get to saftey. He yelled at the top of his lungs.

"CYBERSHARK PULL THE PLUG!!!!!"

On the outside, Vulois' voice spoke in the quietest tone, barely able 
to be heard.

"Cybershark pull the plug."
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Prebon saw that no one was contacting the other base. They were 
sending someone, and they couldn't follow because he would see 
shadows. But Ignatius had something.

"Sir, I think I've found the other base."

"How?"

"I've hacked into the Ark's computers, or what's left of them. They 
are prety messed up, but I've found a log of the Ark's last 25 
transmissions. One goes to something called the Cybertronian Fire."

"That must be it! Where s it?"

"It's too messed up to pinpoint exactly, but I think I can narow it 
down to a 5 square  mile radius. Except...."

"What?"

"It's in South America."

"Well, everyone on Savage. We're going across the world!"

The Trainers took of for South America. On their way they sent a 
message to Slayer.

"We're going to South America for a mission. When we're done we'll 
notify you. If we haven't when you're done find some place called the 
Cybertronian Fire. We thinks it's a Maximal base. We'll need your 
help."
